metadata.notes: Calculations are based on average in-state tuition and fees at public four-year institutions and in-district tuition and fees at public two-year colleges. Prices reflect Ttuition and fees are for full-time undergraduates over a full academic year., with iInstitutions are weighted by full-time undergraduate fall enrollment. Beginning in 2000-–01, data are for first-time undergraduates only..
metadata.source: Based on published tuition and fees from the Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System for 2014–15 and the percentage increase from 2014–15 to 2015–16 from Ma et al., Trends in College Pricing 2015, The College Board.

title: Inflation-Adjusted Growth in Average Published Tuition and Fees from 1990–91 to 2015–16, by Sector
